email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Hope you're doing well.

We have an inquiry for 150,000 MT of Iron Ore, Tubarao to Qingdao, CFR. Looking for a laycan of Nov 10-15. Can you provide a freight quote?

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thanks for reaching out. We can offer the vessel MV IRON MAIDEN, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. Freight rate is USD 22.50/MT for the specified laycan. Demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best,
Alex Nguyen
Trade Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 22.50 seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you sharpen the rate to USD 21.00/MT? Also, can the laycan be extended to Nov 12-17?

Best,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Julia,

I can adjust the laycan to Nov 12-17, but the best I can do on the rate is USD 21.75/MT. The vessel is in high demand, and this is a competitive offer.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

USD 21.75 is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the laycan of Nov 12-17. Please send over the recap.

Best,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Julia,

Great! Recap attached. Thanks for the business!

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarao
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV IRON MAIDEN
Freight: USD 21.75/MT
Laycan: Nov 12-17, 2023
Demurrage: USD 20,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen
Trade Logistics
